title: Matteo Jorgenson to Skip Paris-Roubaix, Mikel Landa Latest Crash Victim at Itzulia Basque Country
content:
Christophe Laporte returns in time for Paris-Roubaix for Visma-Lease a Bike, while Soudal-Quick Step loses two more to injury in what's been a harrowing week of injuries in Spain.

Read the full article at Matteo Jorgenson to Skip Paris-Roubaix, Mikel Landa Latest Crash Victim at Itzulia Basque Country on Velo.
author: ahood
